name: Stone Skipping (Sam Coleman)
description:
Stone Skipping

A short game about skipping stones, that I made in a week.

PLEASE READ: How to play the game:

Walk up to a stone and press E to examine it.

Choose whether to keep it or not.

Go up to the water to skim the stone and press the right mouse button.

The stone will rotate, press the right mouse button to lock it in position.

Then look at the power meter and press the left mouse button to launch the stone.

While the stone is in the air you can apply force to it 2 more times.

Try to get the stone as far as you can.

Follow my twitter for more games in the future
